Deemos and Inzola walk up to Lunarpine and Ramulus.

"Hello?" Deemos asked,=
 he was getting mad.

Gangon's spark is almost DEAD, his spark was trying t=
o join with the Matrix.

Plintissa gets up and Airbomber jumps next to her.=
 Dracona fires an ice beam. Airbomber jumps out of the way and his arm is f=
rozen as he pushes Plintissa out of the way. Dracona laughs. But suddenly.
=

Dracona: What the?

Dracona is grabbed and listed up, and gets the Dudley =
Death Drop from Stronghold and Blender. Blender does the Diamond Cutter sig=
n.

Blender: Bang!

"Nothing like a good beating, as long as your not the o=
ne recieving it." Stronghold said. Sinesis and Sinister fired beams that bl=
asted Blender and Stronghold from behind. They suddenly had trouble moving.=
 Sinesis and Sinister stood up smiling.

"Take a licking and keep on tickin=
g!" Sinister said. The device they were holding was a reprograming device. =
Stronghold and Blender stared mindlessly. Stranato looked on in shock. Drac=
ona stands up and slaps Blender. He wakes up. She slaps Stronghold and wake=
s him up. Blender turns and Train Wreck is running by. Blender trips him up=
! Train Wreck is kicked in the ribs by Dracona. Sinesis and Sinister fired =
at him with the reprogramming beam. Train Wreck stares, looking more evil t=
han before. Arrow is grabbed and whipped by Stronghold, right into Blender'=
s clotheline. Sinesis and Sinister fire the beam and hit Arrow as well. Arr=
ow suddenly turns on Airbomber, firing at him. Airbomber moves out of the w=
ay as a beam hits the spot. Suddenly, the device explodes and blows off Sin=
esis' arm. Plintissa is holding a smoking blaster. Plintissa and Artist run=
 as Sinesis fires furiously with his other arm. Plintissa and Artist escape=
. Airbomber is helped up by Stranato.

"Infectra, run!" Airbomber said. Str=
anato and Airbomber run, leaving their former Radicon teammates behind. Tra=
in Wreck, Sinesis, Sinister, Arrow, Stronghold, and Blender stand next to t=
heir leader, Dracona.

"Our device was destroyed!" Sinister said.

"No matt=
er, we'll get those 5." Dracona said.

Sinesis pokes at where his arm was.
=

"Blizzard, Twister, you with us?" Dracona asked.

Stranato and Airbomber f=
lee into the woods.

Plintissa and Artist run over a hill.

Dracona contact=
s Zardus.

"Zardus, this is anonymous bot looking for a good side, are you =
interested in a good team of 9 bots?" Dracona asks...
